page.title: Let's complete your account!
page.body: You successfully made an account, these next pages will help you fill out missing information such as your profile picture, your bio or your preferences (you can always do this later)

page.title: Add a profile picture
page.body:
Your next mission:

upload an awesome profile picture!
page.message: We don't resell your photos to third parties, we promise!

page.title: Share your personality
page.body: Let's show the world who you are!

talk.false: Prefers not to talk during trips

music.true: Likes to listen to music during trips
music.false: Doesn't listen to music during trips

pet.true: Likes to have pets during trips
pet.false: Doesn't like to have pets during trips

errors.length: Your hobby can't be longer than 20 characters

page.title: You're all set!
page.body:
Thank you for entering all of these information, your account is now complete üòÅ

Press the button to go back to the home page.
